headline: Morgan Stanley Says These 2 Sectors Can Weather Market Volatility — and Suggests 2 Stocks to Bet On
summary: The big story of the past two weeks has been increased volatility. In the wake of President Trump’s will he/won’t he tariff policy, markets have swung down and partway back up – and investors are worried that a trade war may push us over the tipping point and into a recession. Morgan Stanley strategist Mike Wilson is taking measure of the market volatility, and is betting on two sectors that can weather the storm. “On the positive side, the 90-day pause on reciprocal tariffs and further concessi
